beans.description:
Trivial adaptor to illustrate how message metadata can be accessed/modified in script processors.
* reads lines of csv from a file (input/input.txt) * prints out the data and metadata in Processor1 (before metadata modification) * prints out the data and metadata in Processor2 * prints out the data to the console
It may be run as follows:
java org.openadaptor.spring.SpringAdaptor -config metadata.xml
The classpath should include the following:
lib lib/openadaptor.jar lib/openadaptor-spring.jar lib/openadaptor-depends.jar
